content: In what iconic TV show did characters Ross, Rachel, Monica, Chandler, Joey, and Phoebe hang out at Central Perk coffee shop?

That would be "Friends," one of the most popular and beloved television sitcoms of all time. Set in New York City, the show revolves around the lives of six friends—Ross, Rachel, Monica, Chandler, Joey, and Phoebe—as they navigate through their personal and professional lives. Central Perk, the coffee shop where they frequently gather, serves as a central hub for their interactions and has become an iconic part of the show's identity. The series originally aired from 1994 to 2004 and continues to be enjoyed by audiences worldwide.
